document_data.caption: A map showing the Blue Sword River in Unther.
document_data.name: Blue Sword River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blue Sword River''' was part of the [[River of Swords]] located at the border between [[Unther]] and [[Mulhorand]] in the [[Old Empires]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: The Blue Sword River lay entirely within Unther, originating at a freshwater spring in the southeast section of the country and flowing north to join the River of Swords at the border with Mulhorand at the ruins of [[Sekras]].
